1.title: Keshu's New Neighbor
1.plot: It's Keshu and Koki's anniversary and Koki has planned a day out with her husband. But, after she finds a ladies handkerchief with letter 'r' in his pocket, Koki decides to leave the house. Keshu manages to convince Koki to stay back. Meanwhile, Dilruba and Prema, who have been searching for a new house, visit the flat next to Keshu's apartment.

2.title: Double Truck Trouble
2.plot: Prema and Dilruba are having trouble with shifting their luggage to their new home. They find a helpful neighbour in Keshav who is adamant about helping them and getting on the good side of Prema.

3.title: Actress Next Door
3.plot: Keshu's boss learns that an actress is Keshu's neighbor. The boss decides to pay a visit to Keshu's house and meet Prema. When the boss arrives, he meets Koki and mistakes her to be the actress.

4.title: The Neighbour's Visit
4.plot: Keshav decides to workout with Prema. Meanwhile, Dilruba tries to teach Koki some exercise Later, Dilruba and Prema arrive at Keshav's house for dinner. Here on, Koki begins to suspect that Keshav is hitting on Prema, while on the other hand Prema too suspects that Dilruba is hitting on Koki.

5.title: The Shooting Set
5.plot: Keshav lies to koki and visits Prema's shooting location and creats chaos over there. Meanwhile, Dilruba visits Koki and tries to impress her.

6.title: Prema's Birthday
6.plot: It is found that Koki and Prema share the same birthday. Both Keshav and Dilruba gift each others' wives some present. Dilruba gifts Koki her favourite pearl necklace. But Keshav gets confused and gifts Prema a white Pomeranian, which she probably dislikes.

7.title: The Saviour
7.plot: A thief has terrorised the locality and Keshav takes it upon himself to safeguard Prema from the thief. But, Keshav ends up being robbed by the thief. Later, Keshav is mistaken to be the thief by Dilruba and beaten up.

8.title: Keshav's Challenge
8.plot: Prema sees Keshav in the balcony and gets irritated. She complains to Dilruba, who decides to take Keshav to task. When Dilruba arrives in the balcony, he sees Koki and does what Keshav did upon seeing Prema. Koki too like Prema complains to Keshav about Dilruba. In the ensuing conversation, Koki ends up challenging Keshav that he has to woo Prema.

9.title: The Cheque
9.plot: Koki is mad at Keshav for what happened the previous night. But Keshav is surfing on cloud 9 and too happy to care. But as it turns out, if it's too good to be true, it probably is.

10.title: The Spell
10.plot: Koki is with an astrologer, who starts telling her what she wants to hear and Keshav walks in on them. Enraged Keshu throws him out of his house but later goes back to him as he becomes convinced of his powers.

11.title: Healing by Touch
11.plot: Dilruba learns that there is a problem with Koki's eyesight and she might not be able to see again. Similarly, Keshav learns that Prema is not able to walk. Keshav decides to find a cure to Prema's problem. He learns that Prema's problem can be cured by touch.

12.title: Keeping an Eye on Keshav
12.plot: Keshav wants to find out if his wife has really become blind or she is merely acting. When Keshav is at Prema's house trying to heal Prema's leg injury, Koki arrives and reveals that her eyes are perfectly fine. Later, Koki's mother is paying her a visit. Next door, it's Prema's father who is arriving shortly.

13.title: Parental Intervention
13.plot: Koki's mom is in town and she is on Keshu's case head to toe. Prema's father also gets to know of Keshu's intentions but their confrontal caused both the parents meet each other that led to love at first sight amongst them.

14.title: An Ageold Affair
14.plot: Keshu gets to know about Koki's mom and Prema's father. They are trying to keep the relation under cover but Keshu assigns Golkhande to uncover the truth but the circumstance they meet him turns out to be a complicated one.

15.title: An Eventful Dinner
15.plot: Keshu gets to know about Koki's mom and Prema's father. They are trying to keep the relation under cover but Keshu assigns Golkhande to uncover the truth but the circumstance they meet him turns out to be a complicated one.

16.title: The Dinner
16.plot: Kulkarni and Koki are having dinner with Prema and Dilruba in a chinese restaurant while Keshu and Golkhande are spying on them to figure out if there is any interesting romance happening. Kulkarni offers to pay the bill but is shocked when he sees it.

17.title: The Bungalow
17.plot: Kokila requests Keshav to attend Pandit Somnathji's spiritual discourses to lead a better life. Keshav begins to behave like a Baba after attending the religious event.

18.title: Under the Influence
18.plot: Kokila decides to wear salwar kameez to divert Keshav's attention and bring him out of Baba's influence. She dresses up and flirts with Dilruba to teach him a lesson.

19.title: Chintu's Plan
19.plot: Chintu requests Prema to act as his mother before his teacher, in the absence of Kokila and Keshav. The facade gets even more hilarious when Director Toto has to play Chintu's father.

20.title: The Ghost
20.plot: Keshav gets an idea and decides to inform Prema that there is a ghost in Setia's bungalow. Prema visits the bungalow with Keshav, who gets terrified after feeling the presence of a ghost.

21.title: Prema's Pregnancy
21.plot: Prema and Keshav get terrified after spending some time in the haunted house. Prema finds that something is not right and one of Setia's men might be involved. Later, Prema has to pretend that she is pregnant in order to avoid a certain producer.

22.title: Keshav's Disappointment
22.plot: Keshav is disappointed after learning that Prema is pregnant. He arrives on the sets to help Prema. Later, seeing that the Prema's baby bump has visibly reduced, Keshav decides to find out the truth and barges into Prema's house.

23.title: The Flirt
23.plot: Dilruba wants to show Prema that Keshav is not as decent as she presumes he is. He hires an actress, Jwala, for the assignment and asks her to flirt with Keshav.

24.title: Questionable Character
24.plot: Dilruba's plan is working as Prema questions Keshav's character seeing him getting close to Jwala. Keshav tries to explain but in vain. Finally, Dilruba decides to end the drama and asks Jwala to put a 'The End' to the short story.

25.title: Koki is No More!
25.plot: Keshav is told that his wife has passed away. When he arrives home, he finds Dilruba crying inconsolably. When Prema pays him a visit, Keshav shares his sorrow with her.

26.title: Koki is Alive
26.plot: Keshav meets various woman after the supposed death of Koki in order to restart his life. Koki follows Keshav and gets dejected seeing her husband having forgotten her. Finally, Keshav's plan is successful and Koki ends up revealing that she is alive.

27.title: Hunger
27.plot: Keshav notices that Prema is hungry. He asks Koki to prepare extra chapatis so that he can give it to Prema. While Prema is having the food, journalists arrive at her rally.

28.title: Doppelganger
28.plot: Keshav receives orders from his boss to invite Prema to an event. On the acting front, Prema is busy is another shoot. Prema's lookalike is asked to arrive on the sets. Keshav reaches the sets at the same time and mistakes the duplicate to be Prema.

29.title: The Man
29.plot: Prema feels Dilruba is not man enough. She asks Dilruba to start acting like a man and imbibe the qualities of strong men - like the watchman of the society. Dilruba begins his training to become a complete man.

30.title: Prema's Competition
30.plot: Urvashi, Prema's junior, is on the cover of a magazine. Urvashi is climbing up the ladder of fame thanks to the photo shoot. The media starts avoiding Prema as Urvashi is creating a buzz. Prema feels Urvashi will soon replace her.

31.title: The Housemaid
31.plot: Keshav and Koki are in search of a housemaid. Dilruba is delighted to hear this and decides to become Koki's housemaid. He disguises as a woman and gets a job as a housemaid in Koki and Keshav's house.

32.title: Dilruba's Disguise
32.plot: Dilruba, who is pretending to be Paro, gains the trust of Koki. Prema too fails to recognize Dilruba in his disguise. Later, a scuffle ensues between Koki and Dilruba and the disguise is finally revealed to Koki and Keshav.

33.title: Koki's Movie Deal
33.plot: Koki gets a supposed movie deal for two lakhs. Dilruba helps Koki with her script lines. Keshav gets a suggestion from his office friend that the movie might be a dupe, and his wife might be in trouble, so he calls the police and the fakes get caught. While Prema gets a visit from his lawyer about the recent passing of his grandfather and wealth she might inherit.

34.title: Husband for an Evening
34.plot: Keshav gets the responsibility to work on a corporate movie made about his company. Prema's distant family comes to visit to settle the will of her deceased grandfather. Dilbura and Prema gets into a fight. Kulkarni gets to act as Prema's husband.

35.title: The Will
35.plot: Prema is surprised to see Dilruba in the house. Dilruba is furious that Prema has lied to her relatives to inherit the money. Dilruba sees Keshav in the house and gets disappointed.

36.title: The Cristal Chain
36.plot: Keshav gets a crystal chain, and he is using it to hypnotize everyone. First he starts with Dilruaba sending him to ruin Prema movie shoot. Then he uses it on his wife and Prema, but things take a new twist he his plan is messed up.

37.title: A Bad Case of Memory Loss
37.plot: Keshav throws a planter over his balcony and it hits Dilruba on his head. In shock and trauma of the hit, Dilruba has memory loss. He forgets everything and everyone, even his own name. Keshav and Prema plans to get Dil's memory back.

38.title: Dilruba is Kidnapped!
38.plot: Prema plans work as desired and Dilruba gets his memory back. A criminal Kala Kauwa is hiding inside Prema's shooting studio and Dilruba is kidnapped. Prema gets a call from Kala Kauwa asking her for ransom for Dilruba's release.

39.title: Let the Bargain Begin!
39.plot: Dilruba is kidnapped by the criminal, Kala Kauwa and Prema and Keshav wants to rescue him. Kala is asking for a huge ransom, but Keshav with his haggling skills brings the ransom down.

40.title: Keshav wants to Kill
40.plot: Seems like Keshav is frustrated with everything, from his home to his office. An astrologer visits Koki and predicts that someone will die in the hands of Keshav. Keshav brings home a real gun.

41.title: Koki's Brother in Town
41.plot: Keshav wakes up to annoying music and Koki informs him Vicky has come from Delhi. Keshav is sad and irritated as he might try to hit on Prema. As he speculated, Vicky is around Prema most of the time and Keshav has to find a way to keep him away.

42.title: Keshav and his Lucky Charm
42.plot: Keshav opens his front door to a face dyed Pinky who has her face covered with black ink. Prema tells Keshav that she will not be taking him to her movie premiere. Keshav wishes bad luck upon a stall vendor and things turn the opposite way.

43.title: Dilruba in the House
43.plot: Keshav has to be away for the night due to work. Keshav asks his son to make sure Dilruba does not enter the house in his absence. Nevertheless, when Keshav leaves Dilruba arrives.

44.title: Playback Singer in the Making
44.plot: Prema wants to be a playback singer. Prem Darshan, a music industry mogul, is producing an album for Prema. Prem is the superstitious kind and believes in numerology.

45.title: Chill Pill Advertisement
45.plot: Keshav's company has been in losses for some time now and because of that, he has been getting half salary. They approach Super Ads to make their advertisement and feature Prema Shalini to boost the sales of Chill Pill. Also, Golgappa Sharma is starring opposite Prema Ji.

46.title: Dilruba's Success
46.plot: Dilruba has snatched Keshav's job. Impressed by Dilruba, Keshav's job gives Keshav's cabin to Dilruba. Irked by Dilruba's success, Keshav hatches a plan to bring Dilruba to the ground.

47.title: Keshav's Disguise
47.plot: Ramba arrives in Keshav and Dilruba's life. Ramba is intended to carry out Keshav's task. Dilruba is overwhelmed by the arrival of Ramba. But, then the tale takes a twist as Keshav disguises as a goon and threatens Dilruba to pay money.

48.title: Here Comes Anderson
48.plot: Keshav's boss informs Keshav to book a hotel room for Anderson, the company's shareholder. Keshav fails to book the room and as punishment, the boss asks Keshav to take Anderson to his house and treat him well. Anderson's stay results in some friction between Keshav and the guest?

50.title: When Honesty isn't the Best Policy
50.plot: Keshav and Dilruba find themselves unable to tell lies. At the send-off ceremony of Keshav's boss, Keshav spills the beans and ends up embarrassing the boss. When a producer pays a visit to Prema to make an offer, Dilruba ends up revealing her paycheck.

51.title: Dilruba's Mother
51.plot: Prema is angry with Dilruba as his mother hasn't arrived from the African nation with diamonds. Prema kicks out Dilruba and then enters Dilruba's mother.

52.title: The Missing Key
52.plot: Keshav is smitten by Sonia, Sharma's relative. He goes out of his way to help her in every way. Due to heavy rain, Sonia is unable to go home, and Keshav asks her to stay at his home, as Koki has gone out. Keshav does not know that Koki has returned.

imdb.plot outline: Based on the premise of 'Love thy neighbor', the story revolves around the lives of two neighbors, where the men have a soft corner for each other's wives and try their best to impress them. This leads to many awkward and hilarious situations as their hopeless and relentless attempts add to the humor quotient of the sitcom.
imdb.title: Shrimaan Shrimati Phir Se
plot: This series is reboot of Shrimaan Shrimati.

Based on the premise of 'Love thy neighbor', the story revolves around the lives of two neighbors, where the men have a soft corner for each other's wives and try their best to impress them. This leads to many awkward and hilarious situations as their hopeless and relentless attempts add to the humor quotient of the sitcom.
